text: 2005–06 Polish Volleyball League was the 70th season of Polish Championship (6th season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). Gwardia Wrocław and Joker Piła were promoted to Polish Volleyball League in this season. In season 2004/2006 BOT Skra Bełchatów played in CEV Champions League, PZU AZS Olsztyn in CEV Top Teams Cup, Wkręt-Met Domex AZS Częstochowa and Jastrzębski Węgiel played in CEV Challenge Cup.
